ygData.subject: Batlles at both ends...
ygData.msgSnippet: Bronco saw his missle hit the tree. He was bewildered. Yeah, I m okay, but damn it! Why didn t this thing home? Oh, I didn t flip the switch. Okay, now here

Bronco saw his missle hit the tree. He was bewildered.

"Yeah, I'm okay, but damn it! Why didn't this thing home? Oh, I 
didn't flip the switch. Okay, now here we go."

Bronco was about to fire at Choran again, when Octociz spoke up.

Wait! The reason you keep missing is because you're overwhelmed with 
rage. You need intelligence, too. Let me help you.

What do you have in mind?

Make your homing missles lock onto the bot you're fighting, that way 
they will follow him. But if you launch them at him, he might be able 
to deak at the last second, before the missles can repond. Fire them 
towards that bot over there(Imprisoner). But before they hit him, 
they'll turn and hit the original bot.

Okay, I'll try it.

Bronco locks onto Choran, but then aims towards Imprisoner, and fires.
